when_to_say: Used to refer to a vehicle.
example: أحتاج سيارة جديدة. (ahtaj sayyara jadida.) - I need a new car.

when_to_say: Used to refer to air travel.
example: الطائرة تأخرت اليوم. (al-ta'ira ta'akharat al-yawm.) - The airplane is delayed today.
القطار سريع جدا. (al-qitar sari' jiddan.) - The train is very fast.

when_to_say: Used to refer to a two-wheeled vehicle.
example: أحب ركوب الدراجة. (uhibb rukub al-darraja.) - I love riding a bicycle.

when_to_say: Used to describe the location for airplanes.
example: المطار مزدحم جدا. (al-matar muzdahem jiddan.) - The airport is very crowded.

when_to_say: Used to refer to a train or bus stop.
example: محطة القطار بعيدة. (mahatta al-qitar ba'ida.) - The train station is far.

when_to_say: Used to describe a bag or suitcase.
example: أين حقيبتي؟ (ayna haqibati?) - Where is my bag?

when_to_say: Used to describe a travel document.
example: نسيت جواز السفر في المنزل. (naseet jawaz al-safar fi al-manzil.) - I forgot my passport at home.

when_to_say: Used to refer to a road or street.
example: الشارع واسع جدا. (al-shari' wasi' jiddan.) - The street is very wide.

when_to_say: Used to describe road traffic signals.
example: انتظر عند إشارة المرور. (intathir ind isharat al-murur.) - Wait at the traffic light.
